description: Bits 0-3 Value representing the parental rating.
The numbering scheme aligns with Annex F of EN 300 707 v1.2.1 which defines parental rating for viewing.

value.definition: recommended for listeners of any age
recommended for listeners of age Y years, where Y = value + 3 years. e.g., 0x05 = recommended for listeners of 8 years or older.
